definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: For within these rings was bound the strength and will to govern each race.
sentences.chinese: 在中土世界，每隻戒指都擁有統治每個種族的力量。

sentences.english: Sauron, the enemy of the free-peoples of Middle-Earth was defeated.
sentences.chinese: 索隆，中土世界自由人民的敵人，終於被擊敗了。

sentences.english: And on the slopes of Mount Doom, they fought for the freedom of Middle-earth.
sentences.chinese: 他們在險惡的末日火山，爲中土世界的自由奮戰。

sentences.english: China cherishes bilateral traditional friendship and observes the principle that all countries, big or small, are equal.
sentences.chinese: 中國珍視中土傳統友誼，遵循大小國家一律平等原則。

sentences.english: On the meantime, people made a lot of writings about Buddhist, thus brought us many documents of ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 在翻譯佛經的同時，歷代都產生了一些中土佛教撰述。

sentences.english: Hu said that since the establishment of diplomatic ties 14 years ago, bilateral relations have been developing smoothly.
sentences.chinese: 胡錦濤說，中土建交14年來，兩國關係順利發展。

definition: Western Regions (Han Dynasty term for regions beyond Yumen Pass 玉門關|玉门关[Yu4 men2 Guan1])
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
the Indian subcontinent (esp. in Tang or Buddhist context)
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
Han Dynasty term for the Roman Empire 羅馬帝國|罗马帝国[Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2]
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
